meanings.definition: Nightglows: plural noun, the glowing light or illumination present during the night.
meanings.sent1: The nightglows from the city's lights were visible from afar.
meanings.sent2: I love looking at the nightglows of the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fireflies decided to have a party in the nightglows.
meanings.sent4: The nightglows of the lanterns guided us through the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: The nightglows of the moon created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Nightglows: verb, to emit a soft, glowing light during the night.
meanings.sent1: The fireflies nightglows beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The lighthouse nightglows to guide ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent3: The nightglows from the fireflies made the garden look like a fairyland.
meanings.sent4: Her smile nightglows brighter than any star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The nightglows of the fire pit warmed our hearts on that chilly evening.
